#### If possible, provide the log files
- Mac: `~/Library/Application Support/Lepton/logs`
- Windows: `C:\Users\<username>\AppData\Roaming\Lepton\logs`
- Linux: `~/.cached/Lepton/logs`
>Or send it to cosmo.lepton@gmail.com
